Verses: 1 ungalilulla Moopparukku Utanmooppanum, Kirisdhuvin Paatukalukkuch Chaatchiyum, Ini Velippatum Makimaikkup Pangaaliyumaayirukkira Naan Puththisollukiradhennavendraal:
2 ungalitaththilulla Thevanutaiya Mandhaiyai Neengal Meyththu, Kattaayamaai Alla, Manappoorvamaayum, Avalatchanamaana Aadhaayaththirkaaka Alla, Ursaaka Manadhotum,
3 sudhandharaththai Irumaappaai Aalukiravarkalaaka Alla, Mandhaikku Maadhirikalaakavum, Kankaanippuch Cheyyungal.
4 appatich Cheydhaal Piradhaana Meyppar Velippatumpodhu Makimaiyulla Vaataadha Kireetaththaip Peruveerkal.

5 andhappati, Ilaignare, Moopparukkuk Keezhppatiyungal. Neengalellaarum Oruvarukkoruvar Keezhppatindhu, Manaththaazhmaiyai Anindhukollungal; Perumaiyullavarkalukkuth Thevan Edhirththu Nirkiraar, Thaazhmaiyullavarkalukko Kirupai Alikkiraar.
6 aakaiyaal, Etrakaalaththile Thevan Ungalai Uyarththumpatikku, Avarutaiya Palaththa Kaikkul Atangiyirungal.
7 avar Ungalai Visaarikkiravaraanapatiyaal, Ungal Kavalaikalaiyellaam Avarmel Vaiththuvitungal.
8 thelindha Puththiyullavarkalaayirungal, Vizhiththirungal; Enenil, Ungal Edhiraaliyaakiya Pisaasaanavan Kerchchikkira Singampol Evanai Vizhungalaamo Endru Vakaidhetich Chutriththirikiraan.
9 visuvaasaththil Urudhiyaayirundhu, Avanukku Edhirththu Nillungal; Ulakaththilulla Ungal Sakodhararitaththile Appatippatta Paatukal Niraiverivarukiradhendru Arindhirukkireerkale.

10 kirisdhu Iyesuvukkul Nammaith Thamadhu Niththiya Makimaikku Azhaiththavaraayirukkira Sakala Kirupaiyum Porundhiya Thevandhaame Konjakkaalam Paatanupavikkira Ungalaich Cheerppatuththi, Sdhirappatuththi, Palappatuththi, Nilainiruththuvaaraaka;
11 avarukku Makimaiyum Vallamaiyum Sadhaakaalangalilum Untaayiruppadhaaka. Aamen.

12 ungalukkup Puththisollumpatikkum, Neengal Nilaikontu Nirkira Kirupai Thevanutaiya Meyyaana Kirupaidhaanendru Saatchiyitumpatikkum, Naan Surukkamaai Ungalukku Ezhudhi, Enakkuth Thondrukirapati Unmaiyulla Sakodharanaakiya Silvaanuvin Kaiyile Kotuththu Anuppiyirukkiren.
13 ungalutanekootath Therindhukollappattirukkira Paapilonilulla Sapaiyum, En Kumaaranaakiya Maarkum Ungalukku Vaazhththudhal Sollukiraarkal.
14 oruvaraiyoruvar Anpin Muththaththote Vaazhththudhal Seyyungal. Kirisdhu Iyesuvukkullaana Ungal Anaivarukkum Samaadhaanamuntaavadhaaka. Aamen.
